entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
